A pulse-amplitude modulated chlorophyll fluorometer (Heinz Walz GmbH, Effeltrich, Germany) was used to measure chlorophyll fluorescence.
58 After adapting the leaves in darkness for 30 min, the maximum quantum yield of PSII ( F v/ F m) was obtained by analyzing the entire leaf. Maximal fluorescence ( F m) and minimum fluorescence ( F o) were obtained using a 0.8 s pulsed light at 4000 μmol s –1 m –2 and the weak measuring pulses, respectively.
